invocaFlagCheckbox.fieldDescription: Select checkbox if the contact us component needs to be displayed after sometime.
invocaFlagCheckbox.name: ./invocaFlagCheckbox

phonenumber.fieldDescription: Click 'Add Field' to add a new phone numbers to contactus

icon.fieldDescription: Sets an icon for the component
icon.name: ./icon

loDataPersistCheckbox.fieldDescription: Pull Loan officer data from cookies if exist
loDataPersistCheckbox.name: ./loDataPersistCheckbox

url.fieldDescription: Sets the url target for the social media link
url.name: ./linkURL

urlParams.fieldDescription: Url Params provided should be concatenated onto the url e.g. /path/to/url?param1=value1&param2=value2
urlParams.name: ./urlParams

target.fieldDescription: Sets the window target for the link.
target.name: ./target
